intro: Athanasia hastata, commonly known as the everlasting flower, is a succulent plant native to South Africa. It is characterized by its dense clusters of small, star-shaped flowers that bloom in shades of yellow and orange. The plant has thick, fleshy leaves that store water, allowing it to thrive in arid conditions. It is often cultivated as a decorative plant due to its long-lasting blooms and compact growth habit. Athanasia hastata is also valued for its resilience and ability to withstand drought and poor soil conditions.
